meanings.definition: A human being regarded as an individual.
meanings.sent1: Every person has their own unique thoughts and feelings.
meanings.sent2: The person walking down the street waved hello.
meanings.sent3: The person with the funny hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She was a ray of sunshine, a person full of joy.
meanings.sent5: The person in the mirror smiled back at me.

meanings.sent1: His injured person needed immediate medical attention.
meanings.sent2: She took care of her person by eating healthy food.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue on the person lying on the ground.
meanings.sent4: Her person was tired after a long day of work.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's strong person helped him win the race.

meanings.definition: A character in a play or story.
meanings.sent1: The main person in the movie was a brave knight.
meanings.sent2: The author created a mysterious person to drive the plot.
meanings.sent3: The funny person in the comedy made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness made her the most beloved person in the story.
meanings.sent5: The villain was a dark and sinister person in the play.
